title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 20 April 2009 - XWiki
content:
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:08): vnkatesh: The XEclipse patch looks good  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:08): ok :)  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:09): what about the xwiki patch?  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:09): One question: will you implement the missing method for LocalXWikiDataStorage ?  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:09): oh.  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:09): I overlooked that.  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:09): yes, I will.  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:09): There wouldn't be much in that.  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:10): The XWiki patch didn't improve much over the previous version  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:11): Some problems remain:  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:11): - date comparison should be done not based on year = year and month=month and week = week - 1, but by comparing to a parameter bound in Java  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:12): (parameterized query)  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:12): ok  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:12): - space key should have equality check, not "like"  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:13): ok  
cregep left at 00:13 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:14): I'm not sure about the parameterized query, how exactly?  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:14): - doc.type is not valid, you should remove that parameter  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:14): Look at the getModifidPagesHistory method  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:14): ok  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:14): It already contains a query like the one you need  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:15): wouldn't doc.type be needed for attachments/translations?   
EnderMB joined #xwiki at 00:15  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:16): doc.type does not exist  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:16): ok, I didn't know that.  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:16): so how exactly is it now?  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:16): attachments et. al?  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:16): What?  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:17): Those aren't documents  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 00:17): Attachments use XWikiAttachment instead of XWikiDocument  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:18): ok.  
wasja\_ left at 00:19 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:19): I mixed it up with a mail that you sent on the list..  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 00:19): ok, so I will remove that.

sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 10:56): Hi  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:16): I get in troubles with the panel wizard ... I manage to drag & drop a custom panel of my own on the left menu but even if I click on "Save the new layout", when I go on another page the custom panel disapeared !  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:16): Its like there is no saving of my edit ...  
wasja left at 11:18 (Remote closed the connection)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:19): What's the XWiki version you are using?  
JiBz left at 11:21 ("http://www.mibbit.com ajax IRC Client")  
wasja joined #xwiki at 11:22  
JiBz joined #xwiki at 11:24  
florinciu left at 11:26 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 11:26  
ancutagheorghe joined #xwiki at 11:30  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 11:32): Hi again :)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:32): Hi  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 11:32): it's a big day today , isn't it?  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:33): Yes  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:35): h  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:35): hi  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:35): Hi JiBz  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:35): What version of XWiki are you using?  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:36): the last  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:36): 1.8.1?  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:36): yes  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:37): "xwiki-enterprise-installer-windows-1.8.1.exe"  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:37): Then you can manually edit the list of panels, the wizard has some problems in certain conditions  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:37): ok  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:37): I edit the list in the wiki itself or in a file ?  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:38): In the wiki, go to administration > presentation, and there should be two fields, Left Panels and Right Panels (be sure to also select the right value for "Show Left Panels")  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:39): The value is a comma separated list of document full names  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:39): Like: Panels.Search,Panels.QuickLinks,Panels.MyRecentModifications  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:39): Ok thanks to you !  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:40): I was trying to edit the Database before you helped me ! ;)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:40): Yeah, you should never try to do that  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:40): In XWiki, "everything is a wiki document", so there's always a simple solution involving editing a document  
ChathuraPrabuddh left at 11:41 (Remote closed the connection)  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:42): Ok I just begin to understand the pilosophy...   
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:43): I know now why there was a problem: I'm french and I tried to save my new panel with a special char (è) so ...  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:44): Yes, that's one of the known problems, the wizard fails when there are special characters in the name  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 11:44): Somebody will have to look into it  
JiBz - (20/04/2009 11:45): ok

vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 21:12): congrats to all :)  
cristinaS - (20/04/2009 21:13): thanks for showing us the results!  .. we are very happy :)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:13): Yes, congratulations to everyone, including those that were not granted a slot  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:14): It was a very difficult selection to make  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:14): And we're aware that some very good students were left out  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:15): It was very nice to see all of you getting involved  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:15): :)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:15): And we really hope that you will find the time to keep doing that  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:16): I'm really sorry we didn't get more slots  
arunreddy - (20/04/2009 21:16): Congrats everyone... and thanks a lot team. :)  
cregep - (20/04/2009 21:16): can we see the entire ranking list?  
cristinaS - (20/04/2009 21:16): thanks a lot :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh joined #xwiki at 21:17  
wasja left #xwiki at 21:18  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:18): We had about 16 students we really wanted to take  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:18): Then we narrowed the list down to 10 with difficulty  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:18): that's a lot :)  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 21:19): xwiki really deserved more slots  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:19): And in a very long and hot debate we selected 6, and in the end no mentor was 100% happy  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:19): Especially Ludovic  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:19): i am sure the best decision was made :)  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:20): really congrats for all who got a slot  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:20): i will be around anyway  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:20): :)  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:20): not full time, but still around :)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:20): Some really good students, who deserved a slot, didn't get one  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:20): So the decision is not perfect at all  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:21): If this wasn't a recession period, we would have liked to pay for a few more slots, but unfortunately it's not possible at the moment  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:22): Anyway, the selected students would better do a great job, otherwise Ludo will be really unhappy  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:22): :)  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:23): cregep: Looks like Google deleted the ranking, so we don't have that anymore  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 21:23): we would. :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (20/04/2009 21:23): Good luck every one. Its great to have good time with you ppl.Good luck for your projects.:)  
anamariastoica - (20/04/2009 21:32): hey guys, thank you so much. i'm one of the lucky ones and as you can imagine i'm crazy happy :) i'm only sorry that some of the other people that deserve a slot didn't get one... really sorry  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:34): For the accepted students: tomorrow you will revieve emails with "instructions" concerning the next steps  
EnderMB joined #xwiki at 21:36  
vnkatesh - (20/04/2009 21:36): ok  
cristinaS - (20/04/2009 21:36): ok, we are looking forward for them  
vnkatesh left #xwiki at 21:36  
EnderMB left #xwiki at 21:39  
sdumitriu - (20/04/2009 21:39): And everyone else: if you still want to get involved, please don't get discouraged by the fact that you didn't get a GSoC slot, You were good candidates and we'd like to mentor you nevertheless, if you're still interested.  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:40): :)  
ancutagheorghe - (20/04/2009 21:42): congrats again to everyone, i am out for tonight , buh bye

arunreddy - (20/04/2009 21:59): chathura : Good night
